name: Grid of Madness
description:
The Grid of Madness is a Game where you can Move across a 2D Grid wich is made out of many diffrent Blocks, each time you move, the AI also moves, the Color of Block you or the AI lands on has diffrent effects on your lifes.

Green: AI looses 1 HP
Blue: Human looses 1 HP

Red: Whoever lands on the Block gains 1 HP
Yellow: Human or AI gains 1 HP(50:50)

The Goal for you two is it to reach each other wihout any of you dying, so better tell your Robot friend to not kill you off =) try to help each other out

You can also press R to re-generate the Level
